mapper.select:
select rv.rev_idx, rv.rev_content, rv.rev_writedate, rd.req_date, rd.del_state, rd.del_reason, rd.check_date, rs.store_idx, rs.user_idx, st.store_name
from rev_del rd left join review rv on rv.rev_idx = rd.rev_idx left join reservation rs on rv.reserve_idx = rs.reserve_idx left join store st on rs.store_idx = st.store_idx
mapper.update: update rev_del set del_state=#{del_state}, check_date=SYSDATE where rev_idx=#{rev_idx}
